oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Shadowbox of Federal items
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Shadowbox of Federal items, includes breastplate with minie ball lodged in it. The items were found on the south ridge of Rocky Face in the Dalton, Georgia, area.; An article about the items, by Robert Jerry Wise, was reportedly published in the "Western & Eastern Treasure" magazine in the early 1970s.
